data.title: ARIA The CREPUSCOLO Anime Film Announced
data.meta_description: The upcoming anime film by J.C.Staff, ARIA The CREPUSCOLO will open in Japanese theaters…
data.text:
The upcoming anime film by J.C.Staff, ARIA The CREPUSCOLO will open in Japanese theaters on Spring 2021. They also released a special video for the upcoming anime film.

You can watch the special video here

ARIA The CREPUSCOLO” anime film staff

– Chief Director/Script: Junichi Sato

– Director: Takahiro Natori

– Character Design/Animation Supervision: Yoko Ito

– Music: Choro Club feat. Senoo

– Studio: J.C.Staff

Synopsis

Autumn when the city of Neo-Venice is decorated with a carpet of fallen leaves. There was something worrisome about Anya, who spends her days studying at Orange Planet. Alice and Athena are seniors who haven’t seen each other for a long time because they are busy with each other. Because of that, Alice seems to be avoiding meeting Athena, who is not well for some reason. When I asked my friends Ai and Azusa to help me find a way for seniors to meet him, Anya realized that there was a “scenery” that she could see just because she was herself.

Source: Aria Official Website
